body:
## What happened

## Version information

Android Studio `Bumblebee | 2021.1.1 Canary 5` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 58.0.3` • Dart plugin `211.7727`

No Flutter sdk configured.

comment_data.body: Android Studio canary builds are not currently supported.

title: No Flutter sdk configured.
